articles.title: US Researchers Say They’ve Figured Out How To Create Real-Life Images That Move In The Air - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Researchers in the US have made Star Wars style holograms, they say. The researchers used laser beams to trap and illuminate a tiny particle in the air and moved the beam, dragging the tiny particle with it, to draw an image in the air.
articles.content: Inspired by iconic laser displays seen in science-fiction movies, such as Star Trek and Star Wars, US researchers have figured out how to create real-life images that move in the air. And the results… [+1895 chars]
